IMO, I personally see a distinction and a difference.
 But I also see definitive over-lap. Most people who are against gay marriage ARE anti-gay.
 
 What's your opinion?

If there had been an "about half of anti-gay-marriage anti-gay," would have chosen that option instead of the one I did. Also, I now realize I was only thinking of California, as I live there and Prop. 8 is still on my mind.
 
 Nation-wide, though, I agree with you. When you factor in all those red states, it's a definite majority of the AGMers that are anti-gay as well.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Anti-Gay vs Anti-Gay Marriage
